A4.text: Following the 111 BCE Han conquest of Nanyue, much of Vietnam came under Chinese dominance for a thousand years.

A5.text: Vietnam was annexed directly as a province of China, the old policy of cultural assimilation again imposed forcibly, and the country was ruthlessly exploited.
